title: Barclays Computers (PVT) Ltd. - CLEANER-CL681 - 3M Screen Cleaner CL681 (N/W)
specs: Manufacturer: 3M     Part number: CL681     Description: The CL681 removes dust, fingerprints and smudges from laptop, LCD flat panel and CRT screens. Gel cleaning solution won't run, offering easy, mess-free application. Bottle fits neatly in applicator for convenient storage. Alcohol-free formula. 1 screen cleaning kit with 6 oz. bottle.          General     Package Content (EJ) Spray bottle of cleaning fluid,      Squeegee applicator     Width 3 in     Depth 2.8 in     Height 1 in     Color Black
